articles.author: Richard Lawler
articles.title: Former Uber security chief found guilty of covering up massive 2016 data breach
articles.description: Uber paid two hackers $100,000 in Bitcoin to keep a 2016 data breach quiet, and now a jury has convicted former chief security officer Joe Sullivan on two charges for not reporting the incident to authorities.

articles.title: Crypto firm 21Shares lists bitcoin ETP on Nasdaq Dubai - Reuters.com
articles.description: Crypto investment products firm 21.co said on Wednesday its subsidiary 21Shares AG has listed a bitcoin exchange-traded product on Nasdaq Dubai, making it the Middle East's first physically-backed bitcoin ETP.
